com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class AbstractPortCandidateProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.AbstractPortCandidateProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPortCandidateProvider

    public abstract class AbstractPortCandidateProvider
extends Object
implements IPortCandidateProvider
    An abstract convenience implementation of the IPortCandidateProvider interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPortCandidateProvider

        public AbstractPortCandidateProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • addExistingPorts

        protected void addExistingPorts(IPortOwner owner,
                                List<IPortCandidate> list)
        Convenience method for subclasses that adds all existing Ports of the owner to the provided list.
        Parameters:
        owner - The port owner whose ports should be added.
        list - The list to add candidates for existing ports to.

      • createCandidate

        protected final DefaultPortCandidate createCandidate(IPortOwner owner,
                                                     IPortLocationModelParameter locationParameter)
        Factory method that creates a simple candidate that will use the createInstance(IInputModeContext, DefaultPortCandidate) method of this instance to delegate IPortCandidate.createPort(IInputModeContext) queries to.
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner to use for the candidate.
        locationParameter - The location of the candidate. This instance is assigned by reference to the candidate.
        Returns:
        A candidate whose IPortCandidate.createPort(IInputModeContext) method delegates to this instance's createInstance(IInputModeContext, DefaultPortCandidate).

      • createCandidate

        protected final DefaultPortCandidate createCandidate(IPortOwner owner,
                                                     IPortLocationModelParameter locationParameter,
                                                     boolean valid)
        Factory method that creates a simple candidate that will use the createInstance(IInputModeContext, DefaultPortCandidate) method of this instance to delegate IPortCandidate.createPort(IInputModeContext) queries to.
        Parameters:
        locationParameter - The location of the candidate. This instance is assigned by reference to the candidate.
        owner - The owner to use for the candidate.
        valid - Whether the port should be PortCandidateValidity.VALID.
        Returns:
        A candidate whose IPortCandidate.createPort(IInputModeContext) method delegates to this instance's createInstance(IInputModeContext, DefaultPortCandidate).

      • createInstance

        protected IPort createInstance(IInputModeContext context,
                               DefaultPortCandidate candidate)
        Callback method used by the ports created using the factory methods createCandidate(IPortOwner, IPortLocationModelParameter, boolean).

        This method can be overridden by subclasses to perform more sophisticated port creation logic.

        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the instance is created.
        candidate - The candidate to create a port for.
        Returns:
        The new port.

      • getPortCandidateAt

        protected IPortCandidate getPortCandidateAt(IInputModeContext context,
                                            DefaultPortCandidate candidate,
                                            PointD suggestedLocation)
        Callback method used by the ports created using the factory methods createCandidate(IPortOwner, IPortLocationModelParameter, boolean).

        This method can be overridden by subclasses to perform more sophisticated candidate creation logic.

        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the instance is created.
        candidate - The candidate to create a port for.
        suggestedLocation - The location to get a candidate for.
        Returns:
        The new candidate whose Validity may not be PortCandidateValidity.DYNAMIC.

      • getPortCandidates

        protected abstract Iterable<IPortCandidate> getPortCandidates(IInputModeContext context)
        Creates an enumeration of possibly port candidates.

        This method is used as a callback by most of the getter methods in this class. Subclasses should override this method to provide the same candidates for all use-cases.

        Parameters:
        context - The context for which the candidates should be provided.
        Returns:
        An enumerable collection of port candidates.

      • getSourcePortCandidates

        public Iterable<IPortCandidate> getSourcePortCandidates(IInputModeContext context)
        Convenience implementation that simply delegates to getPortCandidates(IInputModeContext).
        Specified by:
        getSourcePortCandidates in interface IPortCandidateProvider
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which the candidates should be provided.
        Returns:
        An enumerable over all source port candidates that are associated with the current context.

      • getSourcePortCandidates

        public Iterable<IPortCandidate> getSourcePortCandidates(IInputModeContext context,
                                                        IPortCandidate target)
        Convenience implementation that simply delegates to getPortCandidates(IInputModeContext).
        Specified by:
        getSourcePortCandidates in interface IPortCandidateProvider
        target - The opposite port candidate.
        Returns:
        An enumerable over all port candidates that are associated with the given opposite port.

      • getStyle

        public final IPortStyle getStyle()
        Gets the style to use for the creation of the port in createInstance(IInputModeContext, DefaultPortCandidate).

        A value of null will make the implementation use the corresponding current default port style.

        Returns:
        The Style.
        See Also:
        setStyle(IPortStyle)

      • getTag

        public final Object getTag()
        The tag to assign to the port in createInstance(IInputModeContext, DefaultPortCandidate).
        Returns:
        The Tag.
        See Also:
        setTag(Object)

        Specified by:
        getTargetPortCandidates in interface IPortCandidateProvider
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which the candidates should be provided.
        Returns:
        An enumerable over all target port candidates that are associated with the current context.
